pinyin: Ai4 er3 lan2 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: Its lithosphere and the Republic of Ireland border on.
sentences.chinese: 它的陸界與愛爾蘭共和國接壤。

sentences.english: The first two islands comprise the United Kingdom and the Republic of Ireland (or Eire )
sentences.chinese: 第一組的兩座島構成英國和愛爾蘭共和國。
